definition: Rectification or Rectifying incorrect work styles, Maoist slogan/cf Rectification campaign 整風運動|整风运动, army purge of 1942-44 and anti-rightist purge of 1957
exactly/in good order/whole/complete/entire/in order/orderly/to repair/to mend/to renovate/(coll.) to fix sb/to give sb a hard time/to mess with sb
Rectification campaign/political purge/cf Mao's 1942-44 campaign at Yanan, and his 1950 and 1957 anti-rightist purges

sentences.english: Rectification means the whole designer should study Originalism through criticism and self-criticism.
sentences.chinese: 整風就是設計師通過批評和自我批評來學習原創主義。

sentences.english: We are to carry out a rectification movement next year.
sentences.chinese: 我們準備在明年開展整風運動。

sentences.english: This was the anti-Rightist struggle, the rectification movement.
sentences.chinese: 這就是反右派，就是整風。

sentences.english: The chief method for dealing with this confusion remains criticism and self-criticism.
sentences.chinese: 整風的方法是批評和自我批評，擺事實，講道理。

sentences.english: And rectification Movement is the concrete emancipation way.
sentences.chinese: 整風運動是解放思想的具體形式。

sentences.english: As this term of the Party School begins, the rectification movement is commencing throughout the Taihang area.
sentences.chinese: 在這次黨校開學的同時，全太行區開始整風運動。

sentences.english: The method of rectification is to make criticism and self-criticism, present the facts and reason things out.
sentences.chinese: 整風的方法是批評和自我批評，擺事實，講道理。

sentences.english: The Yenan rectification and the sinicization of Marxism have close relationship.
sentences.chinese: 延安整風與馬克思主義中國化有着密切的關係。

sentences.english: Following rectification we shall reveal our Party membership to the public.
sentences.chinese: 我們要在整風的基礎上把黨公開。

sentences.english: This was known as the Cheng Feng (Correct Wind) Movement.
The current rectification is like a dose of alum.
sentences.chinese: 這次整風，就是放一把明礬。

sentences.english: Without it some problems may be difficult to solve.
sentences.chinese: 不搞整風，恐怕解決不了問題。
